document_data.caption: A map showing the Unicorn's Horn (labeled T15) on the High Road.
document_data.name: Unicorn's Horn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Unicorn's Horn''' was an [[inn]] located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The inn stood an impressive six stories tall.
document_data.Location: The Unicorn's Horn was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] on the northeast corner where [[Waterdeep Way]] merged with the bend in the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Dead Trades Ward}}
